question: European Investment Bank is to invest 650 million Euros in the construction of the metro line of which Indian city?
explanation:
The European Investment Bank (EIB) announced that it is to invest 650 million Euros in the construction of Kanpurâ€™s first metro service.
The agreement regarding the investment has been recently signed. This is the second metro rail project supported by the EIB in the state of Uttar Pradesh. It had earlier financed the Lucknow Metro rail system.
